author: {'steamid': '76561198042746769', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 487, 'playtime_at_review': 490, 'last_played': 1711438919}
review:
It's really sad that this game isn't properly polished because it looks so very good.
The biggest problems are some "simple" things that need improving. For example: you are highly encouraged to build roads between buildings but those roads don't work well with placing new buildings. If there's a road on a buildable area it will prevent you from building there, in fact, it will not even show up as a buildable area, so you have to destroy the road, segment by segment, with a very unintuitive UI and then, perhaps, it might show up as buildable.
You also can't rebind your keys and other such things.

They do sell it for very cheap on sale, so by all means, try it for your self, it's good fun for a few hours but then you'll see that it does lack depth.

I am very willing to update this review if the devs update the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036573427', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1388, 'last_played': 1709161118}
review:
Gra całkiem sympatyczna, ładna grafika, ścieżce dźwiękowej też niczego nie brakuje.
Sama rozgrywka to w moim odczuciu, może nie kopia 1 do 1 ale cała góra  nawiązań i rozwiązań które znamy z serii The Settlers. 
Jest sporo zabawy i do pewnego momentu gra się całiem fajnie ale... ale robi się schematycznie i powtarzalnie, rośnie tylko rozmiar mapy... i wkrada się lekka nuda.
Mimo to tytuł to mocne 7/10. 
Polecam spróbować! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1705774648}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008701393', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 2731, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2731, 'last_played': 1705936582}
review:
不知道为啥要买（还是原价），我大概是傻逼吧。
随便列几点：
-矮人饿了→不工作→没食物产出→矮人饿了
-矮人饿了，跑去敌营翻食物，被围殴致死
-所有矮人和资源都是唯一的，没了就没了
-一个军队里，近战矮人在往怪群里冲，远程矮人在打建筑物，治疗矮人在营地睡觉
-快递矮人把资源扔了一地，建筑工矮人表示找不到资源
-要把矮人军队放在仓库或者生产建筑物边上才会拿武器，否则状态提示栏里会被矮人找不到武器的提示塞爆。
-其他资源上一条同理
-快递矮人有一个资源收集不到就不会收集其他资源，满地图瞎跑也不知道他们在干嘛

总结：是一款低血压患者可以玩的游戏。

P.S 想玩这类游戏强烈推荐出门左拐的Craft The World

author: {'steamid': '76561198007486006', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1700857677}
review:
Simply put, this game fails even the most fundamental rules of game design.

Game Design 101 dictates that, if you unlock new tools for the player step-by-step (which is totally great), then the player must NEED them and use them to succeed! This game keeps tossing new buildings at you level after level, but do you really need any of them? No! The new buildings that are unlocked are never explained to you, there are no goals that force you to use them, and there is literally no need to use them to win the level. I blazed through 3 consecutive levels by doing the absolutely basic loop taught in the first level: get wood - make axes - make warriors - win. Do you need houses? No, you can build them but the AI don't even use them. Do you need a fisherman? No, the AI will stand around aimelessly complaining that there is no valid place to fish despite standing literally by the sea. Do you need a hunter? Your little Vikings are more than content collecting fruit during their spare time from the numerous bushes growing everywhere.

Simply pointless.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062064640', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1699570414}
review:
Aproveitando a resposta que eu dei para uma analise desse jogos, vamos falar um pouco sobre esse jogo.

PROS

O jogo é bonito e tem uma ótima atmosfera, a questão do dia e da noite são uma ótima adição a esse tipo de jogo.
Ele lembra muito o jogo Settlers e não é por acaso, já que é dos mesmos produtores de Settlers 2.

CONTRAS
Mas devo comentar que a IA desse jogo é exatamente igual a IA do Settlers(1993), 
onde o raio de ação da IA é delimitado pelo raio da construção e pronto, no tutorial ensina a colocar caminhos em direção dos recursos para aumentar o  alcance das construções, mas isso não funciona. 
Se você faz um lenhador e acaba as arvores, pronto acabou o jogo pois o lenhador não é capaz de buscar lenha mesmo que você indique onde ficam, pelo menos no Settlers você tinha a opção de usar uma construção que reflorestava o local para o lenhador.
De novo por culpa do raio de ação das construções, os vikings não dormem na casa mesmo que essa esteja desocupada, a não ser que tenha uma casa literalmente do lado dele.
O certo seria que o viking se alojasse e quando tivesse peto de anoitecer ele voltasse para a casa dele.
Por causa dessa limitação de ação da IA, o jogo acaba te forçando a ter uma receita de bolo, para você prosperar a sua vila.

VEREDITO
Um bom jogo para passar o tempo e se você já jogou Settlers vai se identificar muito com esse jogo. 
Recomento comprar na promoção de pelo menos 75%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198419007580', 'num_games_owned': 1093, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1695860951}
review:
维京人真是太能吃了，前期需要打渔捕猎，后期就种田。
我有一个十分文艺的维京人，一天就喜欢站在沙滩上看海，最后饿死了:)mdzz明明我的仓库里面有吃的他竟然饿死了。黑人问号？？？
同样是有食物，但大家都喜欢跑到深山老林里去找吃的，最后被狼和熊咬死了:)
有些机制不太懂，仓库里面的食物是只有一定范围里的人才回去吃么？几个快递员能形成稳定的网络么？
祭品需要的代价太小了，相对的生产军队需要一群后勤人员保障
.要生产铁的话，需要地质学家->矿工->冶炼厂（游戏翻译是铁水）、烧煤的（具体名字忘了），最后好像只能用来制造更高级的武器，这条线路太麻烦了（虽然有趣..）
战斗系统的话，傻逼牧师不会先给血少的加。感觉一战三奶无敌了..
这游戏能打发时间，这很好

author: {'steamid': '76561198069561215', 'num_games_owned': 186, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 1526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1526, 'last_played': 1698252440}
review:
Étant fan de la série Cultures du studio indépendant Funatics, j'ai franchement apprécié ce jeu qui reprend le même système que leurs jeux précédents, tout en l'améliorant et en utilisant un moteur UE4 et des graphismes plaisants.
Il s'agit donc d'un jeu de stratégie en temps réel et de simulation dans lequel vous devez faire grandir votre colonie de Vikings afin qu'ils puissent atteindre les portes du Valhalla. Il faut assurer leur survie en veillant à ce qu'ils produisent assez de nourriture, mais aussi à être prêt à affronter les créatures hostiles qui se trouvent sur l'île en préparant une poignée de soldat.
Au fur et à mesure que vous avancez dans le jeu, de nouveaux bâtiments peuvent être construits (1 bâtiment = un métier pour un de vos Vikings). Il y a aussi deux façons d'accomplir un niveau, par la force en terrassant les créatures qui protègent les portes du Valhalla ou de façon diplomatique en faisant des offrandes aux Dieux. Il est également possible de faire un mix des deux, donc faire une offrande puis passer à l'offensive pour diminuer le nombre de gardiens de portes.

Par rapport aux anciens jeux Cultures, on voit qu'ils ont vraiment voulu faire mieux, voici les éléments qui ont été simplifiés et qui rendent le gameplay plus agréable.
-Il ne faut plus assigner un métier et un bâtiment à nos personnages, ce mécanisme est automatique, sauf si on souhaite ajouter des "porteurs" à des structures.
-Nos personnages sont plus intelligents, à l'exception des guerriers, ils fuient l'ennemi quand ils n'ont plus beaucoup de point de vie
-La construction des bâtiments est un peu plus rapide, les constructeurs doivent simplement déposer les ressources nécessaire pour achever la construction
-Il n'est plus possible de sélectionner et ordonner un déplacement aux vikings, il est uniquement possible de déplacer les guerriers. C'est parfois moins pratique mais ça simplifie également l'accessibilité. Le jeu est jouable à la manette et je pense que ce changement était obligatoire pour rendre l'expérience meilleure.

A cela s'ajoute évidemment plein de contenu : nouvelles armes pour les soldats, soigneurs, possibilité de lancer des sorts en échange d'une offrande auprès des Dieux, ...

Je recommande donc ce jeu, le seul élément négatif pour moi est l'absence d'un mode "Histoire". Il y a bien une progression qui se fait après chaque partie, mais j'aurai aimé avoir une histoire et pourquoi pas un héro à incarner ...

author: {'steamid': '76561198064641292', 'num_games_owned': 335, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2518, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2518, 'last_played': 1691040631}
review: If you can get it on sale for a few bucks the game is worth that price. Very repetitive, and not in a great way. Very little changes after the first few islands but it is fun for an hour or two at a time. It has a lot of charm but could have used a little more time in the oven. Base price is now $7 which isn't too bad but if you see it on sale, at the time of writing it is 90% off although I have owned it before the sale, don't feel bad about getting it. Not the most fun game but it has a similar charm to Majesty although nothing competes with Majesty. I've put 42 hours into it and I enjoyed that time spent playing. Judging by other reviews I have played it longer than most.

author: {'steamid': '76561198347447937', 'num_games_owned': 370, 'num_reviews': 279, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1691977597}
review:
I built a wood cutter, tool maker and tent. Then the top of the screen was filled with objectives that would not go away or tell me how to complete them. So after almost a half hour of staring at the game and only completed what I just mentioned I turned off the game and am now writing this review.

I recommend the game to people that understand how to play it. It seems the only way for me to continue playing the game is to watch people play it on YouTube so I can have some idea of what to do the next time I play it. When this day occurs, who knows.

I paid $0.69, which is 90% off it's current $6.99 price tag and already got my moneys worth out of it in just a half hour. There's just no way I can say I regret giving up 3 quarters for a game I can continue playing sometime in the future.

So far the game is a 5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990643240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1512209634}
review:
It only took 9 minutes of trying to get the game to run before I gave up trying. That is just the 9 minutes that steam recorded of my attempts. It was closer to 5 hours of reading forums and hunting for clues as to why the game would crash to desktop without reporting an error. 

When I sent a bug ticket to the developers, they closed the ticket 60 seconds later without reason.  Do not waste your money on this game, no matter how cheap it gets on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198218942507', 'num_games_owned': 598, 'num_reviews': 461, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1690299397}
review:
这类策略建造游戏太多了，如果不够出彩很难让人记住。
本作整体而言十分平庸，易上手不是因为引导好，而是机制过于简单。机制简单的同时也充斥着廉价感，很难吸引玩家进一步玩下去。
好评是因为便宜，但凡在3元以下都姑且算个好游戏，再贵就不值了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198233941008', 'num_games_owned': 2343, 'num_reviews': 2008, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1688304739}
review:
Valhalla Hills é um jogo de estratégia e construção de cidades desenvolvido pela Funatics Software. Lançado em 2015, o jogo oferece uma experiência desafiadora de construção de civilizações em um ambiente temático de mitologia nórdica. Nesta análise, vamos explorar os principais aspectos do jogo e fornecer uma análise crítica, destacando os pontos positivos e negativos de forma profissional.

Mecânica de Construção de Cidades Complexa:
Valhalla Hills apresenta uma mecânica de construção de cidades complexa e envolvente. Os jogadores são desafiados a construir e gerenciar uma comunidade de vikings em uma terra hostil. É necessário estabelecer a produção de recursos, expandir a infraestrutura e atender às necessidades dos habitantes, tudo isso enquanto enfrenta desafios ambientais e ameaças de inimigos. A profundidade da mecânica de construção de cidades oferece uma experiência estratégica e satisfatória para os jogadores.

Gráficos Agradáveis e Ambiente Temático:
Valhalla Hills possui gráficos agradáveis e um ambiente temático de mitologia nórdica. Os cenários são bem detalhados e a arte visual captura a atmosfera dos antigos contos vikings. Os elementos de design, como construções, paisagens e personagens, são estilizados e consistentes, contribuindo para a imersão no mundo do jogo.

Desafios Estratégicos e Decisões de Gerenciamento:
Uma das principais características de Valhalla Hills é a ênfase nos desafios estratégicos e nas decisões de gerenciamento. Os jogadores devem considerar cuidadosamente suas escolhas, como a localização das construções, a alocação de recursos e a defesa contra inimigos. Cada decisão afeta o crescimento e o sucesso da comunidade viking, adicionando um componente estratégico gratificante ao jogo.

Replayabilidade e Modo de Campanha:
Valhalla Hills oferece um bom valor de replayabilidade, graças a seu modo de campanha variado e desafiador. Cada nível apresenta diferentes objetivos e condições, incentivando os jogadores a experimentarem estratégias diferentes e a explorarem todas as possibilidades do jogo. Além disso, o jogo também oferece um modo de jogo livre, permitindo que os jogadores construam e gerenciem suas comunidades sem restrições.

Pontos Positivos:

Mecânica de construção de cidades complexa e estratégica.
Gráficos agradáveis e ambiente temático de mitologia nórdica.
Desafios estratégicos e decisões de gerenciamento gratificantes.
Valor de replayabilidade e modo de campanha variado.

Pontos Negativos:

A curva de aprendizado inicial pode ser íngreme para jogadores novatos no gênero de construção de cidades.
A falta de tutorial detalhado pode deixar os jogadores perdidos no início.

Recomendação:

Valhalla Hills é altamente recomendado para os fãs de jogos de estratégia e construção de cidades que procuram uma experiência desafiadora. Sua mecânica complexa, gráficos agradáveis e temática nórdica envolvente criam uma experiência imersiva e satisfatória. Embora a curva de aprendizado inicial possa ser íngreme e a falta de um tutorial detalhado possa ser um obstáculo para os novatos, os jogadores dedicados ao gênero certamente apreciarão os desafios estratégicos e a profundidade do jogo.

Nota: 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198320710355', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1687558339}
review: Скучная игра. Сидишь очень долго, ждёшь, пока за тебя нафармят ресурсы. Никакого взаимодействия с Нпс нет. Механика мне не понятна. Не мог пройти 2-ой остров, так как рэнджа алтаря не доставала до рыбака. Еле как через маленькие склады по одной рыбки доносили раз в 2 минуты. Потом на 3 острове вывалили дофига зданий, открыли тропы, которые более менее решали проблему с рэнджой. Целый час провёл на 2 мини-островах и дальше желания нет разбираться. Может быть как-нибудь... Дело одного дня...

review: So...this plays more like a mobile game or idle game than anything else, so if you're into something to do while you're doing something else, this is for you, but I can't say I recommend it just generally. As another reviewer said, you can't really 'lose' a map, so everything is pretty low-stakes and there's just not going to be a lot of variety to game-play. That being said, the soundtrack is nice and the graphics are perfectly inoffensive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118196721', 'num_games_owned': 175, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 482, 'last_played': 1679264281}
review:
[h1]¿ES TAN MALO COMO PARECE?[/h1]
En realidad no.
[hr][/hr]
[b]¿Qué es lo malo?[/b]
Básicamente tiene todo para ser bueno, pero falla en la ejecución.
Como primer punto: [b]controlas los edificios, no lo a los personajes[/b], lo cual se deriva en perdida de tiempo y me explico, si por ejemplo mi personaje esta cortando leña sin hacha (con las manos) y acabo de crear una... toca seleccionar el edificio para que pare la producción y esperar al rededor de 30 sec ya que si lo vuelvo activar ahí mismo vuelve a cortar leña con las manos, ahora eso para todos los personajes.
Segundo Punto: cada misión o nuevo nivel del modo campaña solo te va mostrando de a una o dos estructuras nuevas, así que cada sesión de juego es lo mismo una y otra vez, no necesitas cambiar de estrategia para ganar.
Tercer Punto: No sé cual era la intención de los creadores, pero el nivel de dificultad es bastante bajo, si lo comparas con un AoE modo fácil o Northgard (para hacerlo más comparable), este está en un modo no queremos que pierdas, solo hay 3 enemigos (fácil de vencer) cuando abres el portal te saldrán 4 más y así van aumentando pero ya después de que tengas un sacerdote, no hay quien te gane.
[hr][/hr]
Así que como parte final, si quieres comprarlo... Hazlo pero una super rebaja de resto es botar dinero.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034660975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1486, 'last_played': 1676292452}
review:
Valhalla Hills ist ein entspanntes Aufbauspiel. Es wurde hier schon berichtet, dass die Wikinger manchmal ein wenig planlos durch die Gegend laufen, obwohl sie bereits eine Aufgabe zum Tragen haben. Das stimmt auch. Aber ich finde, dass macht das Spiel auch irgendwie sympathisch. Man darf es eben nicht so ganz ernst nehmen :-) 

Ziel ist es, einen zufällig generierten Berg hinauf zu gelangen, ein Portal zu öffnen und es zu durschreiten. Wie man sich vorstellen kann, lauern auf dem Weg nach oben unterschiedliche Gefahren. 

Nach 24 Stunden Spielzeit kann ich sagen, dass es mir gefällt. Es lädt schnell. Man kann seinen Spielstand speichern, die Karte neustarten wobei ich glaube, dass sogar bis dato in der Runde gefallenen Wikinger dann wieder mit dabei sind, und man muss sich immer etwas einfallen lassen um die verschiedenen Berge zu erklimmen. Ich hatte auch einen Berg, wo ich das Portal auf Grund eines Vulkans und einer Klippe nicht erreichen konnte. Für diesen Fall kann man die Karte überspringen.

Für mich als Gelegenheitsspieler, der für zwischendurch ein wenig Abwechslung sucht auf jeden Fall in Ordnung.

author: {'steamid': '76561198446095183', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1670292146}
review:
Hora da opinião sobre o jogo, Vale Apena? depende, Se voce procura um jogo nao muito repetitivo não...
O jogo não é muito complexo, é basicamente repetição atraz de repetição, oque as vezes torna ele chato...
as mecanicas são boas, o jogo não tem bugs, e esta totalmente traduzido, mas sinto que falta algo, como uma vila que e sua para sempre e que hordas vão vim e voce tem que administrar ela, E UMA COISA QUE O JOGO PECA MUITO E NO CONTROLE DAS NOSSAS TROPAS OU VIKINGS EM GERAL, VC NAO TEM LIBERDADE NENHUMA PARA CONTROLAR INDIVIDUALMENTE CADA PERSONAGEM PARA QUE ELES EXECUTEM ALGO...

Veredito(Da para se divertir, sem bugs, grafico bonito, mas repetitivo, jogo para sair do tedio por algumas horas dps entrar novamente, preço justo)

author: {'steamid': '76561199090539518', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1667586753}
review:
Викинги..градостроительный симулятор.. что могло пойти не так? Да всё. Начали вы затравку к сюжету - надо продолжать, а тут ничего. Посмотрели мультик, дальше делайте сами из раза в раз одно и тоже без какой-либо мотивации. 

В начале даже сложно было понять, как этим стадом управлять. Просто не сразу дошло, что никак. Нет никакой разницы какой викинг за что будет браться, потому что все равно они будут лежать под деревьями. 

Ну нет в этой игре ничего, чтобы захватывало. Выглядит красиво, как будто интересно, но по факту ты делаешь одни и те же действия на разных картах и если вдруг отойдешь от привычного сценария, то стадо будет просто ходить по проложенным тропам. По факту ты выполняешь один и тот же сценарий и надеешься на другой исход.. но его нет. 

Я думала, что мало времени в ней провела, но чем дальше тем хуже. Нужно оставить отзыв, пока это вписывается в рамки. Зря потраченные деньги

review:
The Sims with beards and swords

I understand why it's mixed, since it's not for everyone, but if you like procedural build up games that require lots of juggling with increased challenge and intensity, then you should give this a shot. Just don't let them starve to death like you did to Timmy in 1997

review:
Не знаю что это.
Но оно, у меня в библиотеке. -_-

review: Leuk voor vele avondjes plezier.

author: {'steamid': '76561199064077243', 'num_games_owned': 18, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 616, 'last_played': 1673354506}
review: 不夸不踩，这边说一下我这十个小时的感受，一开始接触的时候我就觉得，开局一座山，一堆木头，如果你不想办法找吃的，就那个浆果丛根本不够用，直到后来我发现只要捕鱼业放的够多就不用愁吃喝，当我玩上两个小时左右我就开始乏了，就算是地图每把难度是随机，但还是那样，就那一个岛，运气好吧家靠海边周围全是树林，运气不好吧，不靠海，树林熊啊狼啊在那驾着，不及时放小路可能刚开始就折损几个大将，其实这也好说，玩久了每把能放的勇士数量也会随之增多，不过一把玩那么久，处心积虑发扬光大后，看着那敞开的大门也不想进去，不杀光地图上其他生物不罢休，但那又没用，游戏时间拖得越久敌人势力越猛，我也不知道是不是我的认知有问题，总之这游戏有好有坏吧，也没必要使劲拉踩，毕竟十块钱买来的，睡觉之前拿来助眠一下也不错（bushi），最重要的一点，勇士不要挨饿，会罢工，罢工了之后除了猎人就没几个活动的，不过这些说的也只是前期，后期地图挺多矿区的，难度也不会单单体现在这些方面，看自个能玩多久吧，没多少可玩性，如果你比较犟的话你在后面的地图可以一直坚持玩下去，不要进入口，就使劲发育扩大人数，和敌方势力拼团战吧！（但其实如果你按照我说的去做，，你还不如在手机上玩部落冲突）

author: {'steamid': '76561199144848229', 'num_games_owned': 611, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 5562, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2181, 'last_played': 1704787556}

author: {'steamid': '76561199042657548', 'num_games_owned': 615, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 941, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 941, 'last_played': 1659230470}
review:
𝐀𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐠𝐚𝐦𝐞:

For me, this is an economic urban planning simulator combined with RTS. The game is somewhat similar to Settllers II, but not a clone, as I understand the authors are the same. The game has its own charm, its own atmosphere, its own gameplay and dynamics.
At first, your task is to organize a stable, prosperous Viking settlement on a new island, then open a portal and go to the next one. We are building economically significant huts, houses for Vikings to live in. At first, you perform voice-over tasks and go through level after level until you meet underground inhabitants, some mythical miners who suddenly also needed resources. Those who got out must be destroyed by Viking wars, the portals through which they climb to destroy. As soon as you have done this, the game gives you a message, after which you realize that there is no company in the game. Then you collect random cards with the specified parameters and pass them. There is no company in the game, it seems to be there, but it is not there. Instead of a sandbox company and achievements like "kill your time doing the same thing 100500 times". Of course, the lack of company upset me, but I stayed in the game.
Outwardly, everything is not bad, he built a woodcutter's hut, a sawmill, a quarry, a stone cutter, etc. Initially, a woodcutter fells trees with his hands without an axe, but then, as soon as the workshop appears, he can no longer do without an axe. The economic model in the game is not bad, but there are a few points. Apparently, an element of logistics has been introduced into the game to complicate it, but not quite successfully. To store resources, you need a warehouse and an employee on it who will collect products from the nearest neighborhoods. Other Vikings will come to the warehouse and take the necessary resources. If your warehouse is full, Vikings no longer produce products even if there is a need for it nearby. It is necessary to build a new warehouse, but it is not a fact that the Viking will go to a new warehouse for the right thing. Logistics have been introduced for transportation between warehouses and resource allocation, they go to points and collect what they need in one place and bring it to another. As an idea, it's not bad, in fact, with a lack of people, resources and other things, it all turns into a hemorrhoid that takes time and resources. While you are waiting for the delivery of the necessary resources, the miners will easily capture half of the map. Resources are very often not enough, especially at the beginning of the meal, and instead of going to do something together, your units will stick around the campfire and get angry. In terms of economy, the game is poorly balanced and the slightest mistake can lead to the death of the entire population. There is also a limit on the number of units. Units do not always behave adequately. They can start fighting the bear alone, as soon as there is very little health left, they will start running away in the direction opposite to the camp, where I will get to the wolf in the teeth. There are still other evil creatures on the map that will strive to kill your units and until you do the military you will not do anything with these enemies. Since your hard workers, if they fight with them, then mostly alone, heroically dying at the same time. Skeletons from the cemetery can greatly rattle your nerves by destroying everything you build and exterminating your inhabitants. All together, this can push away from the game.

But nevertheless, the game has something to see, something to try.

𝐀𝐝𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐠𝐚𝐦𝐞:

1. Viking settlement simulator.
2. Generation of levels with the ability to choose something more suitable.
3. Good graphics.
4. Norse mythology.
5. Village economy.

𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐚𝐝𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐠𝐚𝐦𝐞:

1. There is no company, instead you need to reach Valhalla.
2. Monotonous levels.
3. Achievements, spend half your life in the game.
4. monotonous gameplay.
5. In my opinion, sometimes an unsuccessful economic model or its implementation in relation to the game.
6. management is not always convenient.

𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐮𝐥𝐭:

I basically played the game for a while, but I don't want to anymore. Those who remember Settlers 2 do not expect the same from this game, there are just similar moments.
I give a thumbs up, but remember there is no company! There will be many monotonous levels.
Treat the purchase carefully, preferably with a discount. Look at the negative reviews, many to the point.

𝐑𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠:𝟼 /𝟷𝟶.

𝓘𝓕 𝓨𝓞𝓤 𝓛𝓘𝓚𝓔𝓓 𝓜𝓨 𝓡𝓔𝓥𝓘𝓔𝓦 , 𝓨𝓞𝓤 𝓒𝓐𝓝 𝓣𝓗𝓡𝓞𝓦 𝓐 𝓟𝓡𝓞𝓕𝓘𝓛𝓔 𝓐𝓦𝓐𝓡𝓓 , 𝓘 𝓦𝓘𝓛𝓛 𝓑𝓔 𝓖𝓡𝓐𝓣𝓔𝓕𝓤𝓛 !

author: {'steamid': '76561198040794942', 'num_games_owned': 675, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 869, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1708975604}
review: Największym atutem jest cena - bo za dość małe pieniądze mamy całkiem sporo zawartości. Owszem, nie mamy pełnoprawnej kampanii, lecz system postępu opierający się na kończeniu kolejnych map i z każdą ukończoną mapą odblokowujemy kolejne elementy - nowe budynki, nowych przeciwników, nowe elementy mapy. W samej rozgrywce widać spore inspiracje takimi grami jak Settlers - jednak bez obaw! Jeśli w oryginalnych osadnikach złożoność systemów produkcyjnych i zależności była dla Ciebie zbyt przytłaczająca, tak w Valhalla Hills jest on odpowiednio uproszczony. Dla hardcorowych fanów tego typu gier, to oczywiście będzie spory minus, jednak dla mnie, osoby która chciała pobudować domki i może czasem komuś skopać tyłek w niewymagającej walce, to zdecydowanie wielka zaleta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314463855', 'num_games_owned': 267, 'num_reviews': 177, 'playtime_forever': 10083, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10083, 'last_played': 1656143554}
review: Dobra strategia ekonomiczna, w której zarządzać będziemy niewielką liczbą osadników, a wznosząc kolejne chatki, rozwijamy naszą osadę. Naszym celem jest dotarcie do portalu i pokonanie przeciwników, aby ukończyć misję i przejść do następnej planszy, a także odblokować nowe rodzaje budynków. Polecam.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995205126', 'num_games_owned': 632, 'num_reviews': 743, 'playtime_forever': 845, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 845, 'last_played': 1644691532}
review:
[b]Valhalla Hills[/b] to przyjemny tytuł z gatunku gier strategiczno-ekonomicznych, mocno przypominający klasyczny tytuł z serii The Settlers, dostosowany i  rozwinięty o nowe ciekawe elementy w którym gracz wciela się w niesfornego syna Odyna, którego zadaniem będzie wsparcie podległych mu wikingów ku drodze do bram Valhalli.

Tytuł choć początkowo zachwyca i bawi, to niestety powtarzalność poszczególnych misji z czasem zaczyna coraz to bardziej doskwierać do tego stopnia że gracz zaczyna się nudzić – nie znajdziecie tu porywającej i głębokiej fabuły, cel jest jeden i niezmienny.

[h1]Ale do rzeczy:[/h1]

Jak już zdołałem wspomnieć na samym początku tej recenzji mamy tym razem do czynienia z tytułem z gatunku gier strategiczno-ekonomicznych, mocno przypominający klasyczny tytuł z serii The Settlers, dostosowany i  rozwinięty o nowe ciekawe elementy w którym gracz wciela się w niesfornego syna Odyna, którego zadaniem będzie wsparcie podległych mu wikingów ku drodze do bram Valhalli.

Rozgrywka nie równi się znacznie od wspomnianego wcześniej tytułu The Settlers na którym odczuwalnie się wzorował, zwłaszcza jej drugiej części co widać po zaimplementowanych szkielecie budowania – z dodatkiem nowych elementów które urozmaicają cała zabawę w tym świecie.

Do głównych zadań gracza będzie należało budowa i późniejsza rozbudowa infrastruktury wioski wikingów, którymi będziemy się opiekować jako bóstwo. Musimy dbać o naszych podopiecznych, dbać o ich bezpieczeństwo, schronienie, wyżywienie i temu podobne aspekty. Które wspomogą ich aby dotrzeć do portalu (główny cel każdej planszy), pokonując wszelakie niebezpieczeństwa czyhające na naszej drodze – starające się za wszelką cenę uniemożliwić nam osiągnięcia wyznaczonego celu.

[h1]Dalej:[/h1]

Początkowo jest to łatwe zadanie, jednakże im dalej zajdziemy w grze tym lokalizacje będą stanowiły coraz to większe wyzwanie dla samego gracza. Obszary rozbudowy będą się rozszerzać, będą pojawiały się nowi przeciwnicy, strażnicy portalu a nawet bujniejsza fauna terenów – wilki, niedźwiedzie itp.

Surowców na mapie nie jest wcale tak dużo, dlatego też należy rozważnie podchodzić do rozbudowy, bazując w dużej mierze na potrzebach naszych mieszkańców – czy też obranych planach w jaki sposób gracz chce osiągnąć główny cel planszy. Czy chce w sposób pokojowy, udobruchać strażników (kapliczki) portalu by pozwoliły mu przejść przez portal, czy przy użyciu brutalnej siły.

Problemem tej gry jest ogromna powtarzalność, początkowo nie zwracamy na to uwagi, jednakże po kilkunastu wyspach, robienia w kółko tego samego zaczyna pojawiać się znużenie. Jestem osobą kura wychowała się na grach strategicznych, gry z serii Age of Empires, The Settlers i temu podobne były moim chlebem powszednim, lecz tu ewidentnie brakuje czegoś co mogłoby przytrzymać gracza w swoim objęciu na dłużej. Nie zrozumcie mnie źle, to nie jest zła gra, można się przy niej bawić dobrze – lecz jeżeli oczekujesz czegoś więcej niż prostej rozbudowy, powtarzalnej rozgrywki to możesz się rozczarować.

Pozytywna strona jest taka że gra jest bardzo tania, nawet edycje fizyczne pudełkowe z kluczem na platformę Steam można zakupić za mniej niż 20 zł – a sam klucz nawet taniej.

[h1]Podsumowanie:[/h1]

Valhalla Hills to przyjemny tytuł z gatunku gier strategiczno-ekonomicznych, mocno przypominający klasyczny tytuł z serii The Settlers, dostosowany i rozwinięty o nowe ciekawe elementy.


[quote][b]Szukasz więcej recenzji?[/b] Zapraszam.
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/32785706/ ]Kurator walas85[/url]
Zachęcam wszystkich do obserwacji kuratora, by na bieżąco otrzymywać świeże informacje o nowo zrecenzowanych tytułach.[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198131783547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 316, 'last_played': 1652162071}
review:
任何想买这游戏的玩家请听我说。。。绝对假不了。
这就是一坨垃圾。

这个游戏真垃圾，打折全 DLC 10块钱，但是开发者的智商连让我给他10块钱的勇气都没有，玩到大概战役第4还是第5关，开局几乎（能建造的位置包括前期唯一免费食物获取点，那一丛浆果灌木丛）没地方建造东西，其他能造东西的地方全是怪，我滴个乖乖，前期没武器，没资源，你用头打。怪物拆房子几下一个。而且伐木完的地方居然不能建造东西？你真他么傻逼，看着你好不容易磨出来的地皮发呆，限制建造的位置，很死板，1000个玩家900多个建筑摆放位置和方式都是一样的，你玩个锤子。
AI 智障的一逼，睡觉哪里怪多他去哪，自杀？而且设置路径让它采集资源，他就一直站着。。。。。。你用眼睛把树枝给我从树上瞅下来。。！我好奇做游戏的自己玩自己做的游戏吗？你这游戏这么傻逼你自己知道吗？

而且怪物打过来，军队无动于衷，你的农夫们 手无寸铁 义无反顾 替 军爷们 冲锋陷阵。死一大堆。。。。。

简直了，这简直是一种折磨，我玩了这么多类似的游戏，这是最傻逼的一个。

游戏发行于2015年，这么多问题开发者知道吗？怪游戏不卖座？你这个态度干脆解散，解甲归田，何乐而不为呢？

author: {'steamid': '76561197987915897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1651671332}

author: {'steamid': '76561198033342338', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 33398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17315, 'last_played': 1698178137}
review: Ich mag dieses Spiel sehr. Es ist vor allem eines: Entspannend. Je nachdem, was ich will und wie ich es will, kann ich einstellen, ob ich in Ruhe meine kleinen Wikinger aufbauen oder gegen Feinde antreten will. Ich denke, hier haben sich schon andere schlaue Köpfe zur Spielbarkeit und Grafik ausgelassen. Daher lasse ich das, weil ich nicht gut darin bin solche Dinge zu beurteilen ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198257668947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1646933109}
review:
Une ambiance sympathique pour un "petit" jeu sur lequel on passerais quelques dizaine de minutes par jour pour décompresser.
Cependant certain point manques cruellement de finition; entre autres les icônes d'informations qui vous sélectionne sélectionne l'ouvrier et non pas directement le batiment dans lequel il n'y a plus de file d'attente, le fait qu'on ne puisse tout simplement pas modifier l'affectation des touches pour les déplacements sur la carte...

bref tout plein de petits désagréments peu gênant pour chacun mais qui cumulés ne permettent pas à ce jeu de vous amuser.

review: На первый взгляд игра выглядит очень хорошо. Удобный понятный интерфейс, приятная графика, не нужно долго вникать. Похожа на упрощенный Cultures. В игре нет кампании, есть песочница, но игра устроена таким образом, что песочница и есть по сути кампания. Вы развиваетесь на острове до нужного уровня, открываете портал (убиваете монстров) и переноситесь на другой остров, на новом острове вам нужно развиться уже до более высокого уровня, что бы открыть местный портал с более высокоуровневыми мобами и перенестись дальше.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000915069', 'num_games_owned': 3912, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1682350397}
review:
A fun game that shares some traits of The Settlers and Cultures... and incidentally the game is also from the same developer of those strategy simulation games - Funatics Software. In Valhalla, there is a linear campaign, but this time round, the maps are procedurally generated. Luckily, you can inject a random seed of your choice, as well as tweak width, and height parameters and opt for fog.

Once a map loads, you get a hilly sloping island in the Norse realm of Asgard. Every map features guardians (eg. ice golems, mummies) you must fight as well as animals (eg. fish, rabbits) to hunt. At the very summit of the island is a portal that you must reach; opening the portal leads you to the next map, that is, after you defeat the monsters / bosses guarding the way. If you own the DLCs, you will need to conquer 5 maps before you can start generating those type of maps.

I thoroughly enjoyed this game that invokes the spirit of The Settlers and Cultures. Give it a try if you like this style of strategy simulation games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111032039', 'num_games_owned': 450, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1594706619}
review:
Mais um bom joguinho relaxante e divertido.
Embora pareça simples e fofinho, o jogo em si tem desafios bem complexos a medida que você vai progredindo.
A mecânica é simples e direta, seus vikings estão presos em uma ilha e precisam sobreviver a todo custo, logo, para isso você precisa fornecer casa para eles viverem, comida e claro armas, afinal existem perigos nestas ilhas que vão de animais selvagens a gigantes de gelo.

A progressão envolve desbloquear novos prédios de construção e novos equipamentos, assim, você também aumenta seu numero de habitantes tendo sempre um limite estabelecido or cenário.
São incontáveis cenários ja que eles são criados randomicamente, então, é praticamente um jogo sem fim, e acredite voc}e pode levar horas em um unico cenário dependendo da dificuldade do mesmo.
Recomendo e muto este jogo para passar o tempo e ter uma experiência diferenciada em um jogo leve bem trabalhado.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962569507', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 429, 'last_played': 1635318919}
review:
Valhalla Hills несмотря на свою простоту достаточно занимательная стратегия. Она отлично подойдёт как «казуальным» игрокам, не любящим разбираться в сотнях аспектах, так и знатокам жанра желающим приятно провести вечер. Благодаря великолепному дизайну и занятной механике, подкидывающей раз за разом новые испытания, оторвать от игры будет непросто. Огорчает лишь скудный набор возможностей, относительная однообразность происходящего и заторможенность ИИ, которая время от времени даёт о себе знать. Всем любителям жанра настоятельно рекомендуем опробовать!
+
— Красивая графика

— Игра постоянно подкидывает испытания

— Кастомизация персонажей

— Простой и удобный интерфейс

— Отлично подходит для новичков в жанре
-
— Викинги иногда отказываются выполнять поручения или ведут себя странно

— Слабое разнообразие игрового процесса

— Отсутствие полноценной сюжетной кампании

author: {'steamid': '76561198444101910', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 442, 'last_played': 1633690301}
review:
[h1] YANOGA REVIEW [/h1]

[b][u] GRAPHICS -  ★ ★ ★ ☆ ☆ [/u][/b]
Really mediocre grapics. Character and Buildings looking kind of boring and the animations are VERY clunky. Light & Reflection Effects on the other hand looking really nice and looking at a whole town at night gives a nice atmosphere.

[b][u] MUSIC - ★ ★ ☆ ☆ ☆ [/u][/b]
The same three songs playing over and over again. The Songs aren't awful but they're not rememarble.

[b][u] STORY -  ★ ☆ ☆ ☆ ☆ [/u][/b]
Vikings lost their honour so you have to climb mountains to restore them to open the gate to Valhalla. 
Focus is not on Story here.

[b][u] GAMEPLAY -  ★ ★ ★ ☆ ☆  [/u][/b]
The idea of the game is quite interessting. Making your way up the mountain is challencing and fun. But after a few times you unlocked everything and you're doing the same stuff in the same order over and over again. 
The game starts really strong in my opinion but there is no long-term motivation. 

[b][u] WORTH BUYING - ★ ★ ☆ ☆ ☆ [/u][/b]
If you like The Seetlers or Buildings Games and you're ok with just having fun for 2-3 days I can recommend Valhalla Hills. I got it on Sale for 2€ and I was really addicted for a couple of Hours. All in All it's a very mediocre game.


 [b][u]    LENGTH [/u][/b]          : Played 7-8 Hours , ''Complete'' the Game would take 13-14

[b][u]    BUGS    [/u][/b]      : No Bugs only dumb KI
  
 [b][u]     PRICE [/u][/b]        : 2€ on Sale
  
 [b][u]     DIFFICULTY [/u][/b] :  Medium-Hard

[h1] FINAL: 

 69 / 100 [/h1] 

If you like that sort of Review, check out my Profile for more! 
Recommending every game over 60

author: {'steamid': '76561198061740176', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 273, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1632427613}
review: Fun for 2 hours until you realize the entire game is like a roguelike if you won every single time you played. You can honestly fist-fight your way out of the first two dozen islands without ever building a civilization of every time. Nothing carries over. The game gets progressively harder and you start off every time with some logs and stones. Enemies can spawn around the most BASIC of resources so fist-fighting ends up becoming the start of every new map far enough in. It gets really boring really quickly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198256175045', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 56269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52307, 'last_played': 1631718179}
review:
considering my playtime it is somewhat weird I am not recomending this game... BUT:

a lot of that playtime is made up by setting up a map, having gold and beer running, going to bed or to work, and then finishing the map. so actual playtime is like 20 minutes out of 8 hours or something.

still leaves a lot of playtime, but that is mostly cause I was hoping for *some* form of progression. like the more maps you conquer, the more starting materials you get. or the faster your vikings run. or ANYTHING really. would have settled for the buildings looking fancier over time or the vikings getting bigger or some other visual.

Like this, it seems like rather lazy design to set achievements as high as they are just to get people to do the exact same thing over and over and over...

author: {'steamid': '76561197966597554', 'num_games_owned': 727, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 7474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7474, 'last_played': 1630109229}
review:
A mediocre city builder that neither does anything too egregious or innovative. Shares similarities to the Settlers game series.

This game features randomly generated maps and also various unlocks such as bigger map sizes, new enemies and new buildings. Early on in the game it is a nice way of introducing the economy and game mechanics gradually as the player unlocks various new aspects of the economy as it slowly gets more complicated.

The unlocks run out quickly though and due to limited variations on the map generation there is basically only one build order or strategy to follow which gets boring rather quickly.

The economy is basically straight out of a basic settlers game. You need to chop trees to get wood at which point you can build basic structures. But you need a sawmill to turn that wood into planks which you can use to build more advanced buildings. There's also stone that follows a similar tree if you can call it that. Grow wheat and process that into flour which then gets processed into bread. The economy chains aren't that interesting or complicated in my opinion.

The visuals and Audio are competently put together. The user interface is okay but lacks a lot of shortcuts and quality of life aspects.

If you don't care about achievements and really like city builders you may get some enjoyment out of this on a heavy discount, although the game doesn't do anything game-play wise particularly well or bad. If you do like to pursue achievements then I'd recommend to steer clear of this one at any price as the achievements are extremely grindy and require cheesing to get through them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095477292', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1629758669}
review: Ein nettes Spiel für die Langeweile zwischendurch. Allerdings kann dieses Zwischendurch gerne mal ein paar Stunden heißen. Sehr niedlicher Stil. Durch das ganze gebaue und schauen wo was fehlt, vergisst man schnell die Zeit. Für Leute die allgemein Aufbauspiele lieben definitiv zu empfehlen. Was mich persönlich allerdings ein wenig stört, man kann die einzelnen Wikinger nicht direkt steuern, wie es zum Beispiel bei Cultures ist.

author: {'steamid': '76561198413064680', 'num_games_owned': 69, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1629930044}
review: 一开始说明看不懂，而且新手教程非常简陋，只能自己慢慢探索，一开始有时很暴躁想放弃，但慢慢玩两局后就莫名无师自通了，游戏挺靠经营的不能乱玩，挺不错的

author: {'steamid': '76561198173300321', 'num_games_owned': 282, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1627323337}
review:
Myślałam, że przekonam się do tej gry po jej ponownym zainstalowaniu i uruchomieniu, jednak po 45 minutach gry jestem w stanie z czystym sumieniem stwierdzić, że stanowczo odradzam. Może to niesprawiedliwe, że nie zagrałam nawet 1 godziny, ale jestem pewna, że lepiej będzie jak wykorzystacie ten czas na inne, lepsze gry, nawet z tego gatunku. Valhalla Hills już po krótkim czasie daje znać, że będzie powtarzalna, szczególnie, że nasi Wikingowie wszystko robią sami (słowa twórców, nie moje). Powoduje to, że czułam się wręcz niepotrzebna, bo jedynie otwierałam portale i klikałam gdzie ma być dany budynek. Twórcy w dziwny sposób tłumaczą główną mechanikę gry, ale nie pokazują jak ona działa w praktyce, co tylko utrudnia granie. Rzadko tak się poddaję z grą, ale niestety, czuję że ta jest stratą czasu...
Jeżeli potrzebujecie czegoś od studia Daedalic to polecam Deponię :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198258509971', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1625593288}
review:
I really enjoy this little mix between Cultures and Northgard!!! :) 
Despite resembling both games this one is unique in its own way... I didn't expect it to run on our old computer and that was one of the biggest surprises. 
I had some troubles with the zooming in and out and I am not sure if it's the in-game problem or it's my PC's video card. 
Overall, it looks amazing! The concept is really interesting - you can progress to the next level/island via a tribute or a battle. I miss the family element of Cultures (the other easiest way to have more workers and soldiers, after the fall from the sky option LOL). I really spend my whole free day playing and learning how to do deal with it and still have a lot to try.
The Unlocking system is also interesting touch and I really appreciate it.
I recommend you this game, especially if you had dreamed to see Cultures in 3D and you are the franchise and the developer's  fan! 
AMAZING GAME, can't wait to see what is happening next! (my own opinion)!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198009247060', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 898, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 701, 'last_played': 1639899217}
review:
Я не знаю как проходить дальше.
Я поставил каменоломню впритык к скалам, но мой викинг этого как будто не видит и не хочет работать (инструмент в наличии). Он не знает чем себя занять. Всё бы ничего, вот только викинги слегка туповаты, всегда этому удивлялся: как можно было такое допустить? Пофиксите искусственный интеллект и тогда я пересмотрю свою оценку игре. Ну, реально, каменоломня в шаге от скал, а викинг отказывается работать...
В общем да...у дровосека 10 брёвен, викинги считают что брёвен не хватает (когда для постройки сооружения в 40 метрах от дровосека требуется от 2 до 4 брёвен) Вы серьёзно? Не пронести два бревна 40 метров действительно так тяжело? Исправляйте искусственный интеллект. Это единственное что следует делать с игрой. Большой и жирный минус за такие косяки!

author: {'steamid': '76561198439651846', 'num_games_owned': 358, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 2079, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 603, 'last_played': 1647376216}
review:
Valhalla Hills é um jogo de estratégia voltado majoritariamente para gerenciamento de recursos, o combate aqui fica em segundo plano, necessário em momentos muito específicos. A captação de recursos lembra um pouco Stronghold, em que os recursos precisam ser coletados, transportados, processados (e reprocessados em alguns casos), exigindo que o jogador erga muitas construções distintas, e as posicione com atenção.

A maior crítica que eu vejo dos outros jogadores é a respeito da IA dos trabalhadores. Em Valhalla Hills os trabalhadores são completamente autônomos, guiados por uma IA (como em muitos outros jogos do gênero). Uma vez convocados para trabalharem em alguma edificação, resta ao jogador apenas rezar para que os seus colonos façam o que precisa ser feito. O problema é que essa IA muitas vezes dificulta ou impossibilita simples tarefas, sabotando completamente o seu planejamento. A crítica à IA procede, embora acredito que muitos desses jogadores ainda não compreenderam as mecânicas do jogo, isso porque Valhalla Hills faz um péssimo trabalho em explicar essas mecânicas. 

Valhalla Hills também não conta com uma história bem desenvolvida, embora a apresentação da premissa central seja ao menos engraçada, e "ascender" seus guerreiros para Valhalla renda alguma satisfação.

Em pouco mais de 10 horas, concluo que o grande desafio do jogador seja manter um bom fluxo de obtenção de alimentos e um sistema logístico eficiente. Não são os desafios que eu esperava quando comprei Valhalla Hills, mas confesso que foi o suficiente para conseguir me entreter. Ele me lembra bastante aqueles joguinhos feitos para tablests e celulares. Gráficos cartonados, mecânicas simples (e irritantes em alguns momentos), um bom preço, facilmente enjoativo e ideal para passa o tempo, quando você não faz ideia do que jogar (ou do que fazer da vida).

Nota: 6,5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197985654160', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 408, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1619452990}
review:
Bei Valhalla Hills hat man die Aufgabe, sich durch Portale von Insel zu Insel zu "kämpfen" um schließlich Valhalla zu erreichen. Dabei muss man nicht immer die Wächter eines Portals bekämpfen sondern kann auch durch Opfergaben diese milde stimmen. Damit es überhaupt dazu kommt, gilt es erstmal eine Siedlung zu errichten. Also baut man einen Holzfäller, einen Werkzeugmacher usw. Das Spiel fängt sehr leicht an und wird nach und nach komplexer, das ist auch ganz gut, da so ausreichend Zeit zum entdecken und verstehen der Mechanik und der Produktionsketten bleibt. Die Grafik ist sehr knuffig gestaltet und es macht wirklich Spaß den Wikinger zuzuschauen. Wenn die Krieger vor dem Werkzeugmacher stehen und auf ihre Äxte warten ist das echt knuffig. Das gesamte Spiel hat mich aber nicht so angefixt wie z. B. ein "Die Siedler 2", das ist aber eine Geschmackssache. Auf jeden Fall einen Blick wert!

Hier der Link zu meinem "Angespielt"-Video:
https://youtu.be/jyC1YSbBKzY

author: {'steamid': '76561198038188249', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 3417, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3045, 'last_played': 1622363923}
review:
상당히 좋은 게임인데 왜 평가가 안좋을까요. 초반 진입장벽 때문에 그런것 같습니다. 조언을 몇가지 드립니다.

1. 세틀러나 마제스티류의 간접명령형 게임은 명령이 수행되는데 조금 여유가 필요합니다. 익숙해지는데 오래 걸리지 않습니다. 그래도 너무 답답하면 2배속과 1배속을 번갈아 써보세요. 단축키는 v입니다. 3배속은 너무 빠르고 적응되시면 사실 1배속이 제일 재밌습니다.

2. 건설중인 건물, 완성된 건물에 꼭 짐꾼(캐리어)을 할당해주세요. 짐꾼이 없으면 재료가 배달되는데 오래 걸려 작업이 거의 멈춘 것처럼 보입니다. AI가 멍청하다, 일을 안한다는 오해를 낳는 최대 원인입니다.

3. 일을 안하는 또 하나의 주범은 도구입니다. 필요한 도구가 없으면 나무꾼은 손으로 나무를 베고.. 광부, 사냥꾼 등은 일을 전혀 못합니다. 도구제작소부터 만들어 필요한 도구를 만들되 초반에는 재료가 부족하므로 필요한 갯수만큼 맞게 만들어주세요. 그리고 도구제작소가 재료를 미리 챙겨놓는 것 때문에 자원이 모자랄 수 있습니다. 특히 초반 고급자원인 널판지가 그런데요. 재료를 너무 많이 챙기지 않도록 짐꾼(캐리어) 숫자를 조절하거나 건물을 비활성화 하면 됩니다. 급할 때는 철거해버리면 갖고있던 재료를 뱉습니다. 도구제작소는 비싸지 않으니 철거를 적극 활용하세요.

4. 적이 너무 세죠? 갓 만든 전사의 능력치로는 바이킹만 계속 죽어나가고 이기지 못하게 되어 있습니다. 공략법은 군사기지 짓자마자 싸우는게 아니고, 기지 많이 지어서 물량전 하는 것도 아닙니다. 전사는 술과 금괴를 먹이면 먹일수록 능력치가 수십배까지 강해집니다. 특히 술로 체력을 늘리는게 중요해요. 천천히 병력을 강화한 후에 싸워주세요. 그리고 군사기지는 건물이지만 전사를 컨트롤하는 집결지점이기도 합니다. 기지 선택한 상태에서 지도에 우클릭하면 쉽게 옮겨지고 이동명령이 됩니다.

즐겜하세요!

author: {'steamid': '76561197980588771', 'num_games_owned': 757, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1701950657}
review:
Valhalla Hills is a good spiritual successor to the Settlers and Cultures series, just like Northgard. But where Northgard mixes in some Civilization mechanics, Valhalla fully goes the Settlers 2&3 route. The missing tech tree overview is (imo) a staple of the genre of games that Settlers, Northgard, Cultures, The Nations, etc. operate in, so be prepared for trial&error.
However: If you own any of the VR headsets, when starting this game it ALWAYS also starts SteamVR, even though it doesn't support VR... This game was released in 2015, why did they never fix it?!? Oh and "Partial controller support" is straight up wrong, none of my controllers works!

author: {'steamid': '76561198081310164', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1620187904}
review: Eu recomendo bastante o jogo, porém ele acaba sendo meio repetitivo demais depois de passar algumas fases. Não cheguei a zerar ainda, eu pretendo, mas em outro momento. No geral, você acaba fazendo as mesmas coisas em certo momento, o que faz ser um pouco massante. O jogo em si é bem divertido em todo momento, ele não chegou a me viciar muito igual outros do gênero, mas com toda certeza vale o preço.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071941767', 'num_games_owned': 301, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1620039988}
review: Tatlımı tatlı bir oyun. Oyunda ilk izlenimlere story modunda küçük bir adada başlayarak bir ilerleme gerçekleştiriyor portaldan geçerek yeni ve daha büyük bir adaya geçiyorsunuz. Tam anlamıyla sandbox denemez gibi. Yerli halk kendi başına hareket ediyor. Siz sadece binaları yolları çiziyor, neyin nerede olacağını belirliyorsunuz. Ve atama yapıyorsunuz. Atamalarıda otomatik olarak boş kalan yerli halktan seçiyor. Baya hoş bir oyun. 6,3/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198053930072', 'num_games_owned': 87, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 267, 'last_played': 1619948509}
review:
É um jogo divertido? Não. É um jogo de cracudo? SIm. Ele é ao mesmo tempo viciante e cansativo. Não espere relaxar ou se divertir com ele, pois a todo momento precisa estar atento às necessidades dos Vikings. As fases são lentas e difíceis, o que gera um certo desafio. É jogo pra quem gosta de planejar, executar e gerenciar.

Prós: 
Em português;
Trilha Sonora 8/10
Tem cara de bobo, mas é realmente desafiador.

Contras:
Gráficos a desejar, mesmo pro estilo do jogo.
Enredo fraco
Repetir o objetivo toda fase, apenas varia as construções e inimigos disponíveis.

Provavelmente vou gastar uma semana de gameplay, pelo rico investimento de 2 reais.

author: {'steamid': '76561199037664921', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 919, 'last_played': 1657496955}

author: {'steamid': '76561198074903995', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1304, 'last_played': 1616887157}
review:
Gostei do jogo, principalmente pelo preço que paguei. Não tem nada de inovador, mas cumpre a proposta dele.
O jogo se torna mais interessante para quem gosta do processo de crescer e administrar a vila, já que o combate é bem limitado e nada desafiador.

O preço compensa até uns 10 reais, não acho que pagaria mais que isso.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034402756', 'num_games_owned': 3370, 'num_reviews': 369, 'playtime_forever': 834, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 834, 'last_played': 1617224538}
review:
[h2]First impressions [/h2]
This game is closer to a city builder than something strategic. You only control where you put down your buildings, you don't have any direct control over the vikings. 
In story mode you start with a small island. On the island is a portal, which can be opened when you fulfilled the requirements of that level. So it isn't a sandbox. The first levels go quite quickly. Later levels have consequences when opening the portals, such as unleashing enemies on your colony. In my playthrough my quarries sometimes didn't work, without any feedback of why not. 
There is also a open mode, with an explicit warning that it's hard. I was looking for a chill time, so I didn't dabble in this mode. 

[h2]Preliminary view [/h2]
Most people were looking for a Settlers experience and didn't find it in this game. I myself would continue the game if I could just keep on building, but I don't feel like starting over again and again. Yet I liked my time in this game, so if you're interested, I recommend playing this, especially for the discounted price, or in a bundle. 

60/100

review:
Valhalla Hills aus dem Hause Daedalic Entertainment ist ein Titel, der es auf die Spitze treibt.

Hausmarken der Firma Daedalic sind bekannt für Ingamewerbung, Anbindung an Microsoft Azure und Unity Analytics. In diesem Spiel allerdings, kommen Amazon AWS, Epic Games und Valve Corporation zusammen und sprengen den üblichen Rahmen. Mit dabei, Plazoboeinstellungen. Entwickler des Produktes ist die deutsche Funatics Software GmbH.

[h1]Involvierte Datei/en mit Sha1 Hash[/h1]
Spielversion: 1.05.17
ValhallaHills.exe | 3bdb4c3c1d4f36e17a8ec3eceabe2fddcffa4c4c
ValhallaHills-Win64-Shipping.exe | 83e05874dc8973db57e9e81ef20713e36d43a7a0

[h1]Beteiligte Firmen[/h1]
[noparse]Amazon.com, INC[/noparse]
Valve Corporation
Epic Games, Inc.

[h1]Valve Corporation[/h1]
Die Valve Corporation hat im Jahr 2020 angefangen IPv6 Tests durchzuführen und diese für Nutzer verpflichtend auf den Client auszuweiten. Auch und vor allem Spiele mit der Unreal-Engine sind davon betroffen, da diese zur Initialisierung eben diese Ip-Checks aktivieren und nach Hause telefonieren.

udp.ipv6check.akadns.net[/noparse][/code]

Der gesamte Bulk kann blockiert werden, denn auch Valve die sich eh schon viel nehmen, müssen nicht mehr bekommen als ihnen selbst zusteht. Vor allem da die Implementierung heimlich von Statten ging. Zu dem Thema liegt mir aus dem genannten Zeitraum noch eine Aussage eines Supportmitarbeiters vor.

[h1][noparse]Amazon.com, Inc[/noparse][/h1]
Amazon stellt in diesem Produkt überflüssigerweise die Releasenotes und Contributornamen zur Verfügung. Leider bekommt Amazon somit natürlich jedesmal unsere IP und damit natürlich auch Infos über unsere Spielesessions und damit auch Nutzerverhalten. Selbst zu hosten oder gar mitzuliefern ohne Internetanbindung... Darauf sind die Entwickler anscheinend nicht gekommen. Datenminimierung sieht anders aus.

[h1]Epic Games, Inc.[/h1]
Epic Games, Inc stellt in Valhalla Hills den Telemetriedienst zur Verfügung. Normalerweise ist dafür der Datarouter Collector zuständig, der allerdings als Endpunkt fungiert.

Hier der Dienst zwar ein anderer, funktionell gesehen allerdings dasselbe.

Namentlich wird in VH die [noparse]etsource.epicgames.com[/noparse] verwendet, die zu jedem Spielstart wie Amazon auch, sich eine andere IP sucht und Telemetriedaten weiterschickt. Das Witzige hier ist zwar, dass die NutzerID "anonmyisiert" wird, allerdings durch Zeitstempel, eindeutige UUID's und weitere Eckdaten wieder eine Aufschlüsselung woher und von wem der Traffic kommt...möglich ist.

[h1]Fazit[/h1]
Ich habe irgendwann aufgehört, weitere Ip-Adressen zu erfassen, denn es ist müßige Detektivarbeit. Für einen Einzelspielertitel der gerade mal 805MB auf der Platte zieht, ist's nicht wirklich wert. Im Spiel befinden sich weiterhin noch Feedbacklinks die auf Facebook, Inc. und Twitter, Inc. verlinken und bei aktiver Mitwirkung 2 weitere Netzwerke bzw. Technologiekonzerne mit eigenen (Referal)trackern aktivieren

Anwender und Interessenten wissen so immerhin, was sie sich auf die Festplatte installieren und auch was im Hintergrund läuft, während Valhalla Hills vordergründig gespielt wird. Fakt ist, alle genannten Dienste können so als Spyware betrachtet werden.

[h1]Plazeboeinstellungen[/h1]
Noch ein Witz zum Schluss: In Valhalla Hills gibt es in den Optionen die Funktion "Tracking", in der der wörtlich steht:[quote]
Mit der Datenerfassung erlaubst du den Entwicklern ANONYM deine Spielfortschritte zu erfassen. Du hilfst damit das Spiel besser zu machen[/quote]

Ach, so? Tun wir das?

Nur ist der Haken in den Einstellungen deaktiviert, sprich aus!!! D.H. Spieler geben also ohne eigenes Einverständnis (wie üblich) Daten und Nutzerverhalten an die genannten Übeltäter und helfen damit nicht nur Entwicklern wie es immer so schön heisst, sondern auch großen Techkonzernen die sich parasitär zwischenschalten. Natürlich bevor Spieler in den Optionen landen (wie üblich)

Das Beste an der Geschichte? Es macht keinen Unterschied aus, ob der Haken in den Einstellungen für das (Nicht)Tracking gesetzt ist oder nicht. Die Dienste sind und bleiben aktiv. Bestimmt ein Versehen....(wie üblich)

Eine Datenschutzerklärung oder gar Nutzungsbedinungen gibt es auch nicht....(wie üblich)

author: {'steamid': '76561198002695639', 'num_games_owned': 494, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4822, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4822, 'last_played': 1512416539}
review:
I also wanted to like this because it seems to be a fun interesting rts.  But, as some have said, It is a chore to figure out and a chore to maintain, and I didn't find myself having much fun with it.  I like the concept but the execution wasn't good.  If you don't do some things perfectly( and it doesn't tell you what to do) your game will come to a halt as your vikings either don't use any tools or don't eat any food, and you will have no idea why they are doing nothing but dying.

My suggestion for viking rts... try Northgard!  It is a really awesome rts, although the campaign is relatively short.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027102673', 'num_games_owned': 386, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 8247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2024, 'last_played': 1669749281}
review:
Azoknak ajánlom, akik szereti a 'nyugisabb' építős stratégia játékokat. Az első küldetések során fokozatosan kapunk újabb épületeket, ill. jelennek meg ellenfelek, én személy szerint kicsit kevésnek találom mindkettőt. Történet igazából nincs, egymástól különálló egyre nagyobb pályákat kell végigvinni. 
A logisztika nem a legjobban lett kitalálva a játékban, és sajnos semmi ráhatásunk nincs az erőforrások elosztására. Előfordult, hogy épp túl messze volt egymástól két épület, amik egymás erőforrásaira támaszkodtak, ehhez külön építeni kell egy outpost-ot, bár nálam a legtöbb esetben ezek is 'üresben' jártak.
Emellett a katonák kezelése kicsit nehézkes, szintúgy az élelmezéssel is lehetnek gondok.
Néha elég nehéz dolgunk van, amikor nincs megművelhető föld a kezdőpont közelében, ezért okosan kell az épületeket elhelyezni.
Összességében sztem több kisebb 'hibával' van a játék megáldva, amik inkább idegesítőek, de mindezek ellenére ajánlom, ha sikerül akcióban megvenni.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070198949', 'num_games_owned': 522, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1610433874}
review:
Игра от создателей римейка «Сеттлеры 2: Десятилетие», которая так сильно пытается угнаться за величием «Сеттлеров», что не гнушается нагло копировать их черты, вот только самую главную черту — душевность — разработчикам скопировать не удалось.

Если проанализировать стратегии с сильной экономичной составляющей, от Сеттлеров до Knights and Merchants, от Цезаря 3 до CivCity Rome, то можно заметить объединяющую черту: хотя в них есть место и тактике, и менеджменту, в первую очередь игровой процесс представляет собой созидательный процесс. Эти игры неторопливы, атмосферны и душевны, а длительность одной партии может переваливать за 10 часов, заполненные неторопливым расширением своих владений, планированием строительства и любованием на быт своих поселенцев. И за эти 10 часов игра не надоедает, нет, напротив — магия жанра состоит в том, что в игру можно проиграть целый день и совершенно не заметить прошедшего времени.

Разработчики Vahalla Hills, видимо, решили, что современному игроку такой темп игры не подходит, и цикл игры был значительно ускорен. Бах — на маленьком острове появляется десяток поселенцев. Пятнадцать минут — и у тебя уже самодостаточное поселеньице. Ещё 15 — и ты уже накопил достаточное число ресурсов и готов войти в портал. И даже если игрок захочет остаться на острове подольше, снизить темп игры, то он обнаружит, что делать-то ему попросту нечего.

Результат просто катострофический. Вместо игры, в которой одна партия занимает душевные 10 часов, мы получаем игру, которая становится репетативной на второй час игры, и никаких дополнительных стимулов это перетерпеть, вроде сюжета, игра не предоставляет. Я обычно не придираюсь к играм, продающимся за 30 рублей, но в данном случае мне даже не жалко тридцати рублей — я просто боюсь, что это пустая трата времени.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11207, 'playtime_forever': 252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1690882055}
review:
This is a 3D rendered real time city building game ripping off games like Dwarf Fortress and Black and White but not as well.   Guide cartoony Vikings to build settlements, fight enemies, find the path to the Bifrost and enter Valhalla!   If only the actual gameplay came anywhere close to the promise of the concept. 

First to get the technical stuff out the way, while they say there's 4K support it's really some kind of crappy HD upscaling, everything looks fuzzy.  Not acceptable for a PC game today.  It's no retro 2D pixel platformer, but that doesn't mean it gets a pass, still looks way worse than it should.  If you're a PC gamer, this is a fail.   Also you're on Steam, so you must be a PC gamer. 

Games like Dwarf Fortress, Settlers, Black and White were all great successes because the games worked.  You could eventually learn them or it was easy to learn them and all worthwhile.  Here, the game is obtusively complex and inaccessible, apparently by design.  Trying to work out what the hell you're supposed to do is headache inducing, despite the annoying "tutorial" popups that don't really tell you anything.    What's the point?  They wanted to do Dwarf Fortress with a GUI but had no idea how to get there?  They wanted to do Settlers but not as well?

All that mess and failure might even be okay if this was like a $2 game, it's worth less than that, but these nutcases are trying to gouge Steam gamers a whopping $21.95, more than the price of games like Frostpunk, for a game they already know is a flop.

author: {'steamid': '76561198160434723', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1609804642}
review:
This game seemed lined up and ready for me to love it with its cute graphics and strategy/builder genre. As someone who never minds a grind and enjoys the simplicity of slowly building your own empire or gradually meeting a scenario's requirements, I thought only time could stand in my way of eventually being addicted. 

I was right. But instead of being faced with a learning curve, I was disappointed to find that it just lacked basic gameplay structure. I usually get annoyed at a tutorial for explaining the obvious and can't wait to just learn by playing, but more clarification is needed in this game. It tells you how to build X, but not how it will affect Y or Z. I spent way, way too much time trying to figure out why my defenseless warrior wouldn't pick up a weapon after having made a dozen, or why no one would deliver one to him. Instead of being challenged I just became more frustrated. If this was the only annoyance that would be one thing, but that frustration is shared toward all aspects of the game as I began to realize I somehow understood less than when I started.

What it comes down to is Valhalla Hills being a chore. You have to invest a good deal of time before *maybe* even liking the game, which defeats the purpose of getting it in the first place. I got this on sale for basically nothing, and still feel like I overpaid.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984790512', 'num_games_owned': 1410, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1607280156}
review:
I have always wanted to get into The Settlers franchise. It's a strategy game that I just didn't have the patience for, and I prefer games where I can directly control my citizens (so traditional RTS games). Valhalla Hills follows The Settlers game mechanics (for obvious reasons); however, I feel games that utilize that mechanic, must do one thing right.

AI villagers must be somewhat intelligent.

Unfortunately, with Valhalla Hills, the villagers are completely broken. They will fight with their bare hands, though they have upgraded weapons, they will not stay in their tents and remain homeless, they will forget to eat; overall, you will spend your time screaming at your monitor as they begin to die. Is this how the Vikings actually perished? We'll never know.

For a full review: https://www.neverendingbacklog.com/episodes/never-ending-backlog-valhalla-hills

author: {'steamid': '76561199086161644', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1270, 'last_played': 1671748344}
review:
Ein tolles Spiel!

Dieses Spiel gibt jedem etwas von dem alten "Siedler-Feeling" wieder. Die Grafik passt wirklich sehr gut zu den Spielelementen jedoch gibt es 2 Dinge, die mich stören.

 1. Ich würde mir wünschen, dass es für deine Kampftruppen so zu zusagen einen "[b] Kampf abbrechen [/b]" Knopf geben würde. Es kann nämlich ganz schön frustrierend sein, wenn deine Truppen am Fuße des Berges ein, zwei Bergzwerge angreifen und dann den kompletten Berg hochrennen, obwohl es beispielsweise 6 deiner Krieger und 30 Zwerge gibt. 

2. Das Zweite, das mich stört, ist, dass man manche Erklärungen wie beispielsweise bei den [b]Kurierrouten[/b] ein bisschen [b] schwammig formuliert [/b] war. In dieser Erklärung wird meiner Meinung nach nur erklärt, wie Kurier funktionieren aber nicht, wie du die verschiedenen Routen einstellst. Ich habe ewig gebraucht bis ich kapiert habe wie diese funktionieren.

Abschließend kann ich jedoch sagen, dass [b] Valhalla Hills [/b] ein großartiges Spiel ist. Es macht immer Spaß und ich habe immer Freude wenn ich das Spiel starte.
